findings.title: Incorrect Implementation of Oracle Function amountRequired()
findings.description: The function `amountRequired()` incorrectly returns a value 1:1 pegged to the given `amountUsd`, resulting in `ICHICompositeOracle` always returning the wrong result.

findings.title: Function closeAllPositions() will always fail after a large enough number of assets have been added
findings.description: The function `closeAllPositions()` iterates over all `OneTokenV1Base` assets, causing its gas consumption to exceed the block gas limit after a large enough number of assets are added, leading to failure when called.

findings.title: Arbitrary.sol: Function executeTransaction() does not refund extra ETH sent
findings.description: Function `executeTransaction()` does not refund any extra ETH sent that exceeds the `value` parameter.

findings.title: UniswapOracleSimple.sol: Oracle does not enforce that indexToken is a USD stablecoin
findings.description: The contract's constructor implementation does not enforce that `indexToken` must be a USD token as stated in the documentation.

findings.title: Function removeStrategy() does not close the strategy
findings.description: The function removeStrategy() does not implement closing the strategy as stated in its documentation.

findings.title: Zero value logic mismatch for stepSize
findings.description: The value of `stepSize` can be assigned to zero in `setParams()` but is not allowed to be so in `setStepSize()`. This mismatch between the two functions may lead to unexpected behavior.

findings.title: Unchecked Liabilities of Collateral Token
findings.description: The redeem() function does not check if the liabilities of the collateral token exceed the contract's balance, which could prevent the user from withdrawing the collateral token afterwards.

findings.title: OneTokenV1.sol: Two-step withdrawal process is redundant
findings.description: The two-step withdrawal process does not provide sufficient protection against flash loan attacks and can be improved for better user experience.

findings.title: Redundant call to _transferOwnership() in init()
findings.description: Function `init()` calls both `initOwnable()` and `_transferOwnership()` which is redundant.

findings.title: Assumed 1:1 Ratio Between Collateral Token and oneToken
findings.description: Arbitrage opportunities might exist when oneToken is not on an exact 1:1 peg with its collateral.
